instructions: In Photos, tap a photo or video to view it in full size. Tap the Action button , then tap Shared Albums. Select an existing shared album, or create your own. Tap Post.
In Albums, select a shared album. At the bottom of the screen, tap People. Turn on Public Website.
In a shared album, tap the Add button . Select all the items you want to add, then tap Done. Add a comment if you want to, then tap Post.
Open the Google Home Service Ads app for Android. Tap the menu at the top. Tap Ads & budget .
Open the Google Home Service Ads app for Android. Tap the menu at the top. Tap Ads and reports . Tap to edit. Choose a date range. Tap OK .
